introduction: SYNOPSISDae-ho, a successful businessman, asks his headstrong wife Seol-hi for a divorce. Shocked, Seol-hi wanders the country and meets Mi-ryung and Han-il. When Mi-ryung kills herself after spending a night with her first love and realizing the futility of her indulgent ways, Seol-hi sees herself in Mi-ryung. Seol-hi rebuffs Han-il and learns that she must love herself. She finally returns to where she belongs.故事一个有能力的商人，大浩，无法抵挡他的自觉的妻子苏茜，并提出离婚。迷茫的苏wan从首尔徘徊，遇见与丈夫分居，正在寻找家的女子汉一。宋熙熙嫁给一个初恋男人并与一个初恋男人离异后，通过遗书看自己。认识到自己不能爱（自爱）的现实的苏熙，摆脱了韩立的诱惑，走到了自己的巢穴。
